details:
Invalid `prisma.expenseAccounts.findMany()` invocation:

{
  where: {
    businessId: {
    ~~~~~~~~~~
      in: [
        "86dfd48a-8161-45a5-a4d3-47412047adf6"
      ]
    },
?   AND?: ExpenseAccountsWhereInput | ExpenseAccountsWhereInput[],
?   OR?: ExpenseAccountsWhereInput[],
?   NOT?: ExpenseAccountsWhereInput | ExpenseAccountsWhereInput[],
?   id?: StringFilter | String,
?   accountNumber?: StringFilter | String,
?   accountName?: StringFilter | String,
?   balance?: DecimalFilter | Decimal,
?   description?: StringNullableFilter | String | Null,
?   isActive?: BoolFilter | Boolean,
?   lowBalanceThreshold?: DecimalFilter | Decimal,
?   parentAccountId?: StringNullableFilter | String | Null,
?   siblingNumber?: IntNullableFilter | Int | Null,
?   isSibling?: BoolFilter | Boolean,
?   canMerge?: BoolFilter | Boolean,
?   createdBy?: StringFilter | String,
?   createdAt?: DateTimeFilter | DateTime,
?   updatedAt?: DateTimeFilter | DateTime,
?   deposits?: ExpenseAccountDepositsListRelationFilter,
?   payments?: ExpenseAccountPaymentsListRelationFilter,
?   creator?: UsersScalarRelationFilter | UsersWhereInput,
?   parentAccount?: ExpenseAccountsNullableScalarRelationFilter | ExpenseAccountsWhereInput | Null,
?   siblingAccounts?: ExpenseAccountsListRelationFilter
  },
  include: {
    expense_account_deposits: true,
    expense_account_payments: true
  }
}

Unknown argument `businessId`. Available options are marked with ?.
